articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Rehab center owner pleads no contest in $175M billing scam
articles.description: The founder of a Los Angeles sober-living facility is facing 20 years in prison for running a $175 million health care billing scam

articles.author: NASSER KARIMI and JON GAMBRELL Associated Press
articles.title: Thousands prepare to bury Iranian general killed by US
articles.description: Thousands of Iranians are gathering in the country's southeastern city of Kerman, preparing for the funeral of a top general killed by a U.S. airstrike in Baghdad last week
articles.content:
TEHRAN, Iran -- 
Thousands of mourners prepared Tuesday to bury a top Iranian general killed by a U.S. airstrike in Baghdad, demanding retaliation against America for a slaying thats drastically raised tensions across the Middle East.

articles.title: Court hearing set in Maryland newspaper shooting case
articles.description: A judge in the case of a man who has pleaded guilty but not criminally responsible to killing five people at a Maryland newspaper has scheduled a hearing to consider whether any additional court records should be made public
articles.content:
ANNAPOLIS, Md. -- 
A judge in the case of a man who pleaded guilty to killing five people at a Maryland newspaper scheduled a Tuesday afternoon hearing to consider whether any additional court records should be made public in the case.

articles.description: Australia has been ravaged by wildfires this summer.
articles.content:
